name: Swipe Football Free
description:
Introducing Swipe Football Free! The free version of Swipe Football Pro. Swipe your way to glory by shooting at the net using in-game touch technology. Counter the crosswind speeds, kick the right distance and speed, just like you are kicking a real football!

How to play:
---------------
-Keep an eye on the wind direction and kick the ball in the opposite direction to compensate wind force.

-Swipe in the direction you want to kick the ball.

-Game starts with ten lives, for every miss you lose a life.


Privacy Policy: http://www.rocketsplashgames.com/apps/privacy-policy.html
